BREAKING: White House releases Obama’s birth certificate – CNN Political Ticker - CNN.com Blogs
 
 
 White House releases Obama birth certificate 
 
 
 (CNN) - The White House released President Obama's original birth certificate Wednesday.
 
 The surprise release follows recent and sustained remarks by businessman Donald Trump, among others, that raised doubts as to whether the president was born in the United States.
 
 
 
 Watch, as this changes nothing. I say the birthers won't be appeased, even with this. -poet
It's going to be fake, he's going to be weak for being pushed into giving in to the madness (that one I could agree on) and he's still going to be too black for most of the birthers.

 It's called "cognitive dissonance'.

he's going to be weak for being pushed into giving in to the madness

 
 Pushed into giving in to the madness? How exactly do you figure that one? The President is an elected official, put into office by those who voted for him, IE the people of the nation. As such doesn't that make him and every other elected official our employees? And as our employees aren't they supposed to be bound by workplace etiquette and follow the orders of their superiors?
 
 After all if they're the ones in charge then why do they rely on us to vote on who gets into office and who doesn't? Why do we have any say if we have no authority?

There have already been plenty of people crying "fake" and pointing to "layers" on the birth certificate. That's all refuted however, and by Fox News nonetheless. If the birthers are too neo-con for Fox News, then it's probably time to take it down a notch.
